name: 神无·樱之篇
description:
This is a rather traditional puzzle solving game
It tells a fantastic journey
A thrilling adventure story
You can appreciate the charm of myth culture in different countries here
Explore the puzzle with the protagonist
Looking for the truth
At present, it includes a chapter of playable content, with about 30 to 40 minutes of game time
It has no wonderful puzzles
No good pictures
There is no fascinating story
Not even finished
This is just my first step in making games
But I will continue
What you need to learn
Music, art, program
Until I can really present my game to every player
Thank you for your support!
